Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
dp.pa.controller.BaseController
dp.pa.controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends BaseController
The controller for the Main Menu of the GUI.

    • OnActionAddPartMenu

      public void OnActionAddPartMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates to Add Part Menu.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • OnActionModifyPartMenu

      public void OnActionModifyPartMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates to Modify Part Menu if a part is selected. Sets the part chosen as a static data member in the Modify Part Menu controller. If a part is not selected, displays an error box suggesting to choose a part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • OnActionModifyProductMenu

      public void OnActionModifyProductMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates to Modify Product Menu if a part is selected. Sets the product chosen as a static data member in the Modify Product Menu controller. If a product is not selected, displays an error box suggesting to choose a product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • OnActionDeletePart

      public void OnActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes a selected part from the Inventory. Confirms deletion via a pop-up box asking for confirmation. If the part deletion fails, an error box is shown. If no part is selected, nothing occurs.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method

    • OnActionAddProductMenu

      public void OnActionAddProductMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates to the Add Product Menu.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • OnActionDeleteProduct

      public void OnActionDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes a selected product from the Inventory. Confirms deletion via a pop-up box asking for confirmation. A Product with associated parts cannot be deleted - an error message will be shown. If the deletion fails, an error box is shown. If no product is selected, nothing occurs.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method.

    • OnActionSearchParts

      public void OnActionSearchParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches the parts tableView for parts matching the user input. User may search via id (integer) or name (string) - if one search fails, the other is attempted. If one result is found, it is highlighted in the table. If multiple results are found, the table is filtered. If no results found, an error message will display.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method.

    • OnActionSearchProducts

      public void OnActionSearchProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches the products tableView for products matching the user input. User may search via id (integer) or name (string) - if one search fails, the other is attempted. If one result is found, it is highlighted in the table. If multiple results are found, the table is filtered. If no results found, an error message will display.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method.

    • OnActionExit

      public void OnActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Exits the program. A dialog box asks the user to confirm prior to program shutdown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event that triggers the method.
